attributes.action: All meat to be clearly defined as Halal or Kosha. Consumer awareness buy or not.
attributes.additional_details: More openess around animal welfare to the consumer. The majority of people are not Kosha or Halal  consumers and would not because of their beliefs want to eat any food dispatched that way. It would allow the consumer to choose and give all citizens rights ethics, beliefs, etc  the ability to accept ir reject the product
attributes.background: Within the meat industry and in retail shops I want a clear description in the product of how the animal was dispatched also on menus.  I wish to be able to buy or not depending on my beliefs and ethics.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737327
